title: Transcend the Self-Knot of Fear
author: A Discourse Given by His Divine Presence, Adi Da Samraj
summary: When a questioner asks about the fearfulness he feels "locked" in his body, Avatar Adi Da Samraj responds that the root of fear is the same as the root of all suffering: the "self-contraction", or the activity of identification with a separate and mortal body.Rather than avoiding the fear inherent in the body, Adi Da Samraj Calls us to understand and transcend the self-knot in the Divine Condition that is Always Already the Case.

tracks.trackName: There Is No Fear in the Divine Condition
Fear and the Two-Armed Form of the Master
The Real "Now" Is Beyond "Point of View"
Sacred Sightings of Avatar Adi Da Samraj

title: The Divine Is Not the Cause
author: A Discourse Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: In response to a series of questions about self-awareness, the nature of the "ego", and how the self-contraction is caused, Avatar Adi Da Speaks of the self-confinement of human beings (in contrast to non-humans as natural contemplatives), the effort to trace any experience or thought to its Source, and the Divine Reality as the True Condition of all things (not the "cause" of any thing).
s3URL: The Divine Is Not the Cause

tracks.trackName: Non-Humans and the Sphere of Energy
There Is No Cause of Conditions
Sacred Sightings of Avatar Adi Da Samraj

title: The Illusion of Familiarity
author: A Discourse Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: This DVD presents Avatar Adi Da's Discourse of October 29, 2004. In Part 1, He addresses a question about "history", and begins an address to the illusory nature of a permanent or fixed past, future, or even present "identity". In Part 2, a devotee describes an incident of temporary amnesia, and Adi Da Samraj takes a humorous approach to getting to the heart of the experience. In Part 3, He describes the seventh stage process and the unique nature of His State.

tracks.trackName: The Tacit Attractiveness of My State
Be Liberated from the Weave of Patterns
Sacred Sightings of Avatar Adi Da Samraj

title: The Fundamental Purpose of Existence
author: Discourses Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: In these delightful and humorous conversations, which took place in New Zealand in 1988, Avatar Adi Da gives basic Instruction about the requirements of real Spiritual life. To grow beyond limitations and enter into the stream of real growth, Adi Da explains, a most profound and creative process of ego-transcending practice must be entered into--a process made possible by the Grace and Help of the Realized Spiritual Master.

title: The Commitment to Real-God-Realization
author: Discourses Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: In these direct and challenging Talks, Avatar Adi Da describes the requirements for a life of Real-God-Realization. He discusses the great and universal Law that "you become what you meditate on"--or, you realize whatever state your attention rests in--and He reveals the ancient practice of devotional relationship to a true Guru that Realizes true Freedom and Happiness.

title: After My Lifetime
subtitle: A Collection of Talks (1974-2004)
author: Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj, on His Eternal Divine Work
summary: In honor of the passing of Avatar Adi Da's physical Body, we offer this exceptional collection of Adi Da's Instruction covering the significance of this Yogic Event, the ever-present Gift of the direct relationship to Him, and the never-ending Nature of His Work to Bless and Awaken all beings.

tracks.trackName: There Is No Death For Me
The Qualities of My Eternal Presence
You Will Find Me Just As Before
I Will Work With You Directly Forever
No One Like Me Has Appeared In This Place Before
Incarnating My Pattern Here In Perpetuity
All Have Equal Access To Me
I Have Said What Needs To Be Said
I Will Be Incarnated Countlessly Through My Devotees
I Am The Heart That Is You

title: Awaken To Brightness
author: Discourses by His Divine Presence, Adi Da Samraj
summary: A selection of Discourses from 1974 to 1997, which cover a broad spectrum of Avatar Adi Da's Instruction. They provide a basic introduction to His Wisdom-Teaching and include Adi Da addressing principle matters of Spiritual life.

tracks.trackName: Poems from Crazy Da Must Sing

title: Buddhism, Advaitism, and the Way of Adidam
author: A Discourse Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: A Discourse in which Avatar Adi Da Samraj gives a unique summary of the ultimate Realizations in Buddhism and Advaitism (or Advaita Vedanta), and describes the sympathetic likenesses between these traditions and the Way of Adidam.
s3URL: Buddhism Advaitism and the Way of Adidam

tracks.trackName: Buddhism, Advaitism, and the Way of Adidam
Buddhism, Advaitism, and the Way of Adidam
Buddhism, Advaitism, and the Way of Adidam
Buddhism, Advaitism, and the Way of Adidam
Buddhism, Advaitism, and the Way of Adidam

title: Cracking the Code of Experience
author: A Discourse Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: A devotee's question about memory and a bicycle accident sparks Avatar Adi Da's Discourse about the nature of the human mechanism. Likening the mind to "cyberspace", Avatar Adi Da describes the "codes" human beings use to interpret perceptions and give apparent meaning to the "game" of life.

tracks.trackName: Memory and the Cyberspace of the Body-Mind
Self-Identity Is a Parasite on the Real Condition

title: Crazy Da Must Sing, Inclined To His Weaker Side
subtitle: Confessional Poems of Liberation and Love
author: Recitations Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: Nearly all the poems on this recording were written by Avatar Adi Da Samraj between 1971 and 1976. On August 12, 1982, Avatar Adi Da wrote the final poem of this collection. Two weeks later, this recording was made at that occasion.
s3URL: Crazy Da Must Sing, Inclined To His Weak

tracks.trackName: The Gospel That Can Be Written...
The World Is Endlessly Allowed To Be...
I Often Think Of Buying A Cane.
No One Like Me Has Appeared In This Place...
An Ignorant One Who Reads Nothing.
All The Names Are Already Written...
I Am Born To Purify Myself Of The World.
Narcissus Is The Pig Who Sleeps In My Navel
I Have Heard And Seen Enough.
My Worth Is On The Eye.
I Am Mindless In This World
I Stand Before You In All My Forms.
The Worlds Are An Exclamation Of My Names.
Alone Is The Conditions Of Bliss...
We Are Waiting For Something To Happen To This.
There Is A Force Of Loneliness Around My Heart.
The Worlds Fall Out Of My Right Hand.
I Served To Priest The Pharaohs...
My Loved One Sits Upon My Knee.
Those Who Despise Me Love Me In Secret.
The One Who Crawled Me Off His Knee...
I Have Been Lost In Karmas Of Rejection...
The Earth Is Not A Place For Me...

title: Death and The Purpose of Existence
author: Discourses Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: A collection of Talks and Recitations that exemplify Avatar Adi Da's essential Wisdom-Teaching on death. Includes a range of excerpts, taken from throughout the 30 years of Avatar Adi Da's formal Teaching-Work.
s3URL: Death And The Purpose Of Existence

tracks.trackName: Death Is Not the End of Anything

title: Do This Yoga In All Your Parts
author: A Discourse Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: Avatar Adi Da speaks of how the devotional Yoga in the Reality-Way of Adidam is not about struggling with the difficulties of the body-mind, but of surrendering the "four faculties" (attention, feeling, body, and breath) in devotional response to Him.
s3URL: Do This Yoga In All Your Parts

tracks.trackName: Do This Yoga In All Your Parts

title: Garbage and the Goddess
author: A Discourse Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: Avatar Adi Da addresses the fact that the Reality-Way of Adidam is not about attaining any kind of experience--whether ordinary or extraordinary. Rather, it is about Satsang, or the relationship with Him, and the Divine Spirit-Blessing that is received in His Company.

title: Happiness Is Prior to Pleasure and Need
author: Two Discourses Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: In the two Talks on this CD, Adi Da Samraj describes the necessity for self-understanding in our search for pleasure and in our attachments--particularly in the domain of sexuality and intimate relations.
s3URL: Happiness Is Prior to Pleasure and Need

title: Human History Is One Great Tradition
author: A Discourse Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: Adi Da Samraj discusses how the various manifestations of Buddhism fit within the Great Tradition of human "religion" and Spirituality. Avatar Adi Da Samraj also describes how His seven stage schema provides a tool for understanding all traditions.
s3URL: Human History Is One Great Tradition

tracks.trackName: Buddhism Is a Complex Historical Phenomena
The Way That Is Pure from the Beginning
The Rarity of True Spiritual Transmission
A Basic Education In The Great Tradition

title: I Am Your Unique Advantage
subtitle: Three Talks on the Supreme Gift and Ancient Tradition of Heart-Response to the Realizer
author: Discourses Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: A remarkable collection of Talks in which Avatar Adi Da Samraj describes how--by means of spontaneous heart-response to His Divine State--His devotee is effortlessly drawn beyond the illusion and sufferings of presumed separateness, into the ecstasy of Divine Communion.

title: Klik-Klak: The Pattern Patterning
author: Discourses Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: In the first talk, Avatar Adi Da elaborates on "Klik-Klak", a term He uses to describe the mass of conditions that are only constantly shifting and replicating patterns, that never manifest any fixed "objects" or "entities". He Calls all to Realize That Which is Always Already the Case.

title: Let Death Make You Serious About Life
author: A Discourse Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: Avatar Adi Da describes how we ourselves determine our present experience, in every moment--during life, in the course of the death-process, and after death. He explains that, in order to transcend the mechanical sufferings of bodily (and after-death) existence, we must become...
s3URL: Let Death Make You Serious About Life

tracks.trackName: Let Death Make You Serious About Life
Let Death Make You Serious About Life
Let Death Make You Serious About Life
Let Death Make You Serious About Life

title: My Kiln of Brightness
author: Discourses Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: In the second Talk Adi Da makes the important distinction between actually Realizing the Divine Reality and making gestures toward an idea of the Divine. He uses the analogy of clay pigs in a kiln to describe the Process whereby He Draws beings beyond the realms of experience...

title: Nothing Is As It Appears
author: A Discourse Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj

title: Persist in the In-Depth Process
author: A Discourse Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: Avatar Adi Da discusses the accumulated life-patterns that apparently dictate the course of an individuals" experiences and actions. He examines the fact that bodies are actually "programmed" to die--that they are necessarily finite and mortal appearances.

title: Reality Is Beyond Point Of View
subtitle: A Selection of Talks from the Wisdom-Teaching of the Ruchira Avatar
author: A Selection of Talks Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: This selection of Talks from throughout the 30 years of Avatar Adi Da's formal Teaching Work bring together samples from His vast Divine Instruction relative to the true nature of Reality--as the unknowable Condition that is Always Already the Case, prior to "point of view."
s3URL: Reality Is Beyond Point Of View

tracks.trackName: You Can't Get There from Here
Be Moved By Me to Infinity
Transcend the Camera of the Body-Mind
The Self-Evident Falsity of the Search for Changelessness

title: Reality Is Conscious Light
author: Discourses Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary:
In "Reality Is Conscious Light",
Avatar Adi Da speaks about the necessity of Realizing the Nature of Reality. He Reveals the esoteric truth about Consciousness, Love-Bliss, and Light, and He draws His listeners into His Condition of Transcendental Consciousness.

title: Reality Is Not What You Think
author: A Discourse Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: In this Talk, Avatar Adi Da illuminates the false presumption that Reality is made up of separate things and separate beings. He Reveals that Reality is a Great Unity of Love-Bliss, and it is only our own reactivity and fear (or the self-contraction) that creates this illusion of separateness.
s3URL: Reality Is Not What You Think

tracks.trackName: Reality Is Not What You Think
Reality Is Not What You Think
Reality Is Not What You Think
Reality Is Not What You Think

title: Remember About Being Happy
subtitle: Instructions to and about Children
author: Discourses Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: Avatar Adi Da gives humorous and loving answers to questions from children and speaks of the freedom and the responsibility that parents and guides must grant to children for the sake of their "growth and out-growing".

tracks.trackName: Remember The Mystery In Which You Live

title: Renouncing the Search for the Edible Deity
author: A Discourse Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: A remarkable Discourse by Avatar Adi Da Samraj on how the shock of (apparently) independent existence initiates the false search for the "edible deity"--or for "food" that is perfectly sustaining.
s3URL: Renouncing the Search for the Edible Dei

tracks.trackName: Renouncing the Search for the Edible Deity
Renouncing the Search for the Edible Deity
Renouncing the Search for the Edible Deity
Renouncing the Search for the Edible Deity
Renouncing the Search for the Edible Deity

title: Science and the Myth of Materialism
author: Discourses Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: This selection of Talks from throughout the 30 years of Avatar Adi Da's formal Teaching-Work brings together His essential Instruction relative to the psycho-physical nature of the world, the limits of scientific materialism, and the Inherent Unity of Existence.
s3URL: Science And The Myth Of Materialism

tracks.trackName: An excerpt from The Presumption Of Being
An excerpt from The Mythology of Absolute Objectivity
Realization Is the Foundation of True Science

title: Science is a Method, Not a Philosophy
s3URL: Science is a Method Not a Philosophy

tracks.trackName: Knowledge Is Useful, Truth Is Not 1
There Is Nothing Absolute About Science
Knowledge Is Useful, Truth Is Not 2

What Does the Universe Really Look Like?
The Heaven-Born Gospel Of The Ruchira Avatar
Love Is How I Got To Here
Luxuriate In The Life Of Contemplation

title: Step Two - The Five Steps Of Adidam
s3URL: Step Two - The Five Steps Of Adidam

tracks.trackName: The Fire Must Have Its Way
Renouncing The Search For The Edible Deity

title: The Asana of Science
author: A Discourse Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: In this recording from 1980, Avatar Adi Da Samraj speaks about the false presumptions upon which the conventional scientific point of view is based. Avatar Adi Da goes on to describe our inherent participation in Reality, and calls us to understand the limitations of present and traditional dogmas.

title: The Bodily Location of Happiness
author: A Discourse Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: In this recording of Avatar Adi Da Samraj from 1981, He speaks about the nature of True Happiness and how it can be realized moment to moment--not through seeking but through the practice of the Way of Adidam.

title: The Causal Position
author: Discourses Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: On August 11 and 16, 1995, Avatar Adi Da engaged His devotees in profound "consideration", speaking with them through a speakerphone. During His "consideration", Avatar Adi Da Gives unprecedented descriptions of the structure of the mechanism of attention.

title: The Cosmic Mandala
author: A Discourse Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: A Discourse from 1982 in which Avatar Adi Da describes the vision of the entire cosmos as a great Mandala of color, which can be experienced experienced and "seen" in the death process. This Instruction by Adi Da Samraj is a means to understand the phenomena in the death process.

title: The Divine Domain Is Not Elsewhere
author: Discourses Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: In the first Talk, Avatar Adi Da Gives essential descriptions of the Great esoteric matters of Divine Translation and the Divine Domain--which He points out, are in fact are not comprehensible apart from Realization Itself.

title: The Divine Is Not the Cause
author: A Discourse Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: In response to a series of questions about self-awareness, the nature of the "ego", and how the self-contraction is caused, Avatar Adi Da Speaks of the self-confinement of human beings (in contrast to non-humans as natural contemplatives).
s3URL: The Divine Is Not the Cause

tracks.trackName: Non-Humans and the Sphere of Energy
There Is No Cause of Conditions
The Heaven-Born Gospel of the Ruchira Avatar
Enter My Sphere and Leave Yours
Love Is How I Got To Here

title: The Fundamental Purpose of Existence
author: A Discourse Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: To grow beyond limitations and enter into the stream of real growth, Adi Da explains, a most profound and creative process of ego-transcending practice must be entered into--a process made possible by the Grace and Help of the Realized Spiritual Master.

title: The God Who Truly Is
author: A Discourse Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: Avatar Adi Da describes the Way of Adidam as the utter transcendence of fear. He speaks about finding True God as Source rather than "Creator", and He describes the mechanism that is actually responsible for generating the conditional universe, closing with ecstatic poetry.

title: The Grace 0f Turning To Me
author: Discourses Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: In this selection of Talks Given in August and September of 2004, Avatar Adi Da Gives potent and summary Instruction in the fundamental practice of the Way that He Offers. Through His Masterful Means of Humor, Compassion, and Direct Address, Avatar Adi Da undoes the habit of seeking.
s3URL: The Grace Of Turning To Me

tracks.trackName: Be Moved by Heart-Recognition of Me
Turn to the Source, Not the Content
You Are Seeking Me, Not Turning to Me

title: The Heaven-Born Gospel Of The Ruchira Avatar
author: A Discourse Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: "Satsang", or the transformative relationship between the Guru and devotee is, the fundamental "gospel" of all the great religious and Spiritual traditions. The Spiritual relationship to the "Heaven-Born" One is Avatar Adi Da's unique Offering.
s3URL: The Heaven-Born Gospel Of The Ruchira Av

tracks.trackName: The Heaven-Born Gospel Of The Ruchira Avatar
The Heaven-Born Gospel Of The Ruchira Avatar

title: The Impulse to God-Realization
author: Discourses by His Divine Presence, Adi Da Samraj
summary: This selection of Talks by Avatar Adi Da Samraj focuses on His clarifying Wisdom on the Impulse (inherent in all beings) to Realize God, and His Divine Offering and Instruction on the Ultimate Means to cultivate this heart-Impulse, thereby allowing it be the guiding force of one's entire life.

tracks.trackName: You Can Suffer or You Can Love
Love Is How I Got to Here

title: The Law of Love-Bliss
author: A Discourse Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: A "consideration" of the perennial religious proposition of "seeking for Truth". Avatar Adi Da contrasts this proposition with the principle of non-seeking that underlies the Reality-Way of Adidam. He inspects the philosophy of materialism and the "dark" vision it proposes, versus the Way He Offers.

title: The Liberating Word Of Adi Da Samraj
s3URL: The Liberating Word Of Adi Da Samraj

tracks.trackName: Remember The Mystery In Which You Live
Reality Is Not What You Think
Be Moved By Me To Infinity

title: The Master Is The Means
subtitle: Talks on the Ancient Way of Devotion to the Spiritual Master
author: Discourses Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: A collection of discourse excerpts from 2004-2006 in which Avatar Adi Da Samraj describes the spontaneous heart-response to the Realizer as the great, effective, and anciently known Means of Spiritual Awakening.

tracks.trackName: Turn to the Source, Not the Content
Spend Your Time in the Company of Your Master

title: The Primal Space
author: A Discourse Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: "The Primal Secret of devotee practice is to practice in Satsang--to practice in the Primal Space, as if always sitting in the Company of the Heart-Master." --Avatar Adi Da Samraj

title: The Primary Sensation
author: A Discourse Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: Avatar Adi Da speaks of the true nature of the ego, or the sense of separate and separative existence, as an "activity" and not an "entity". He emphasizes the distinction between understanding and transcending the very core activity that is the ego itself and struggling with the effects of the ego.

title: The Quest for the Historical Self
author: A Discourse Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: In this Discourse, Adi Da Samraj proposes that all human lifetimes are a "quest for the historical self". He describes how this search is based on the activity of "self"-contraction--the erroneous presumption of an actual, defined, knowable "self".
s3URL: The Quest For The Historical Self

tracks.trackName: The Separate Self You Claim To Be
The Demonstration of the Divine Conscious Light

title: Two Essays and a Talk from The Revelation Of Ruchiradam
author: Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: On April 21, 2001, Avatar Adi Da Samraj recited two Essays that He had just completed within the preceding week: "Truth and Religion" and "The Self-Evident Falsity of the Search for Changelessness".

author: Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: In this historic occasion at the Mountain Of Attention on December 11, 2005, Avatar Adi Da Samraj reads His own renderings of portions of the epitome Non-dualist text, The Ribhu Gita.

tracks.trackName:
"The Plain Truth of Traditional (or Sixth Stage) Non-Dualism,

title: The Spiritual Gospel of Saint Jesus of Galilee
subtitle: Re-Told--and Revealed Again--
author: A Recitation By His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: Avatar Adi Da offers a unique and beautiful rendering of the moral and Spiritual teachings of Jesus of Galilee. In this recording, you will hear testament to Jesus's authenticity as a great Realizer.
s3URL: The Spiritual Gospel of Saint Jesus of Galilee

title: The Third Fundamental - Disciplining Attention And
The Way Beyond Ego
author: Discourses Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: In the Discourses selected for these CDs, Avatar Adi Da leads His listeners through the maze of egoic misinterpretation of real Spiritual practice by articulating and debunking the errors that occur when such practice is engaged from the point of view of egoity (or presumed separateness).

Find Me, Know Me, Recognize Me

author: A Discourse Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: Using the metaphor of a camera to describe the "focal point" of the human presumption of "self", Avatar Adi Da discusses the Way that goes beyond the "shutter" of the ego.
s3URL: Transcend The Camera Of The Body-Mind

Transcend The Camera Of The Body-Mind

author: A Discourse Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary:
When a questioner asks about the fearfulness he feels "locked" in his body, Avatar Adi Da Samraj responds that the root of fear is the same as the root of all suffering: the "self-contraction,"
or the activity of identification with a separate and mortal body.

tracks.trackName: There Is No Fear in the Divine Condition
Fear and the Two-Armed Form of the Master
The Real Now Is Beyond Point of View

title: Transcending the Cosmic Domain
author: A Discourse Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: On August 11 and 16, 1995, Avatar Adi Da engaged His devotees in profound "consideration", speaking with them through a speakerphone. During His "consideration", Avatar Adi Da Gives unprecedented descriptions of the structure of the mechanism of attention.

title: Understanding
author: A Discourse Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: On the first night of His Teaching-Work (April 25, 1972), Avatar Adi Da Gave this presentation of His "radical" argument relative to the activity of separation that is the root of all suffering and dilemma. When that activity is "understood", then the Real Divine Condition can be felt and Enjoyed.

title: Adidam Is the Seventh Stage Way
author: A Discourse Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: Avatar Adi Da's remarkable Discourse of September 23, 2004, in which He describes, in technical detail, the distinctive qualities of His Reality-Revelation in the context of the Great Tradition. With over three hours of extraordinary footage from a single night, watching this dvd is an opportunity to experience a whole evening of Discourse Given by Adi Da Samraj as He Describes His seventh stage Way in perfect detail for the sake of all beings.
s3URL: Adidam Is the Seventh Stage Way

tracks.trackName: The Demonstration of the Great Tradition
The Yoga of My Avataric Person
Adidam Completes and Transcends the Great Tradition
Seriously Study the Reality-Way of Adidam
The Perfect Practice Transcends the Errors of the First Six Stages of Life
The Seventh Stage Realization Is Not Present in the Traditions
The Great Event at Lopez Island

title: God Is Not in Charge
subtitle: Discourses given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
author: Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: Avatar Adi Samraj directly addresses the false presumption of "God-As-Parent" that is fundamental to conventional religion.

tracks.trackName: The Adept is the Sign of God
The One Divine Is Not the Creator

title: Approach Me from the Heart
author: A Discourse Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: In this lively and intimate discussion, Adi Da Samraj eloquently addresses several questions, including "What are the fundamental emotional-sexual limitations of beings in this realm?" And "What is a Divine experience?" This DVD also offers the opportunity to witness the devotional relationship between Avatar Adi Da and His devotees.

title: Beyond Sex, Science, and "self"
author: A Discourse Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary:
Avatar Adi Da Samraj Reveals that Liberation cannot ever be achieved through sex, science, or religion. And He makes the astounding assertion, "Realization has nothing to do with the body-mind."

Watch this DVD for Adi Da's Instruction on True Freedom, which He says is discovered only in the utter transcending of "point of view", by means of the Transmission of Reality Itself.

tracks.trackName: Sacred Sightings of Avatar Adi Da Samraj

title: The Commitment to Happiness
author: A Discourse Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: Avatar Adi Da Calls for a serious inspection of ordinary experience, and for the embrace of true Spiritual practice, or "sadhana"--which occurs in the context of right relationship to the Guru. He describes the lawful approach to the Spiritual Master, which is not fundamentally about receiving explanations but about coming into conformity with the Master's Pattern. For His devotees, this conformity (or Communion) occurs through heart-attraction to His egoless Divine State.

title: Cracking the Code of Experience
author: A Discourse Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: A devotee's question about memory and a bicycle accident sparks Avatar Adi Da's Discourse about the nature of the human mechanism. Likening the mind to "cyberspace", Avatar Adi Da describes the "codes" human beings use to interpret perceptions and give apparent meaning to the "game" of life. He also exposes as an illusion the very presumption of being a separate, perceiving self.

tracks.trackName: Memory and the Cyberspace of the Body-Mind
Self-Identity Is a Parasite on the Real Condition
Sacred Sightings of Avatar Adi Da Samraj

title: Easy Death
subtitle: Discourses on the Ultimate Transcending of Death and Everything Else
author: Discourses Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: Drawing from all the years of His Work, Avatar Adi Da speaks to the human reality of death--from the Perfect Disposition of Absolute Freedom. He offers a way beyond the sorrow of loss: a compassionate and real service to the dying; a profound understanding of fear as well as of the greater process in which death occurs; and the Ultimate Demonstration of What Is, Prior to life and death. This DVD makes an excellent study complement to Bhagavan Adi Da's Easy Death book.

tracks.trackName: Realization Is the Only Liberation from Loss
How to Serve the Dying Person
Death Is a Sacrifice in the Divine
Your Practice Will Not Be Lost at Death
The Ultimate Form and Force of Divine Translation
The Utterly Transparent Manifestation of the Divine "Bright" Reality

title: Enter Into Unlimited Profundity
author: A Discourse Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: When Avatar Adi Da Samraj is asked a question about "karmas" as determining factors in human life, He points to something even more fundamental than the universal law of cause and effect: in every instant of life there is the same opportunity to examine the true nature of existencethe non-necessity of the presumption of separate self in the face of Reality Itself. Therefore, Adi Da says, the impulse to Realize Truth does not require that one be in the midst of suffering--any moment of existence is a sufficient moment to enter into the Unlimited Profundity of Reality Itself.

tracks.trackName: Every Moment Is Suitable for Profundity
The Profound Nature of Reality Itself
Sacred Sightings of Avatar Adi Da Samraj

title: The Grace of Suffering
author: A Discourse Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary:
Avatar Adi Da makes clear that, no matter what the state of your life--whether apparently positive or apparently negative--there is always the present opportunity to enter into Communion with the Divine.
"It is only when you begin to comprehend your life as suffering, as limitation, as dis-ease in some very fundamental way that you will practice real or Spiritual life in its true form."--His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj

title: Human History Is One Great Tradition
author: A Discourse Given by The Avataric Great Sage, Adi Da Samraj
summary: In response to a devotee's question about Zen Buddhism and Spiritual Transmission, Avatar Adi Da discusses how the various schools of religious and Spiritual expression fit within one "Great Tradition". Avatar Adi Da also Discourses on His seven stage schema for understanding all traditions, the qualities of real Spiritual Transmission in various traditions and closes with a discussion of belief-based myths and how "religious provincialism" is transcended through the guidance offered in His Basket of Tolerance.
s3URL: Human History Is One Great Tradition

tracks.trackName: Buddhism Is a Complex Historical Phenomena
The Way That Is Pure from the Beginning
The Rarity of True Spiritual Transmission
A Basic Education in the Great Tradition
Sacred Sightings of Avatar Adi Da Samraj

title: The Great Secret
author: Discourses Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: Avatar Adi Da gives Instruction about the Secret that has been known since before recorded history to those who are most serious about Spiritual life. It is the Secret of Liberation from the dead-end of seeking and a life of unhappiness. To discover this Secret is the true heart-desire of every being. Avatar Adi Da Samraj describes the Realization of Truth and Its necessary practical foundation in these excerpts from Discourses given in 1988 at the Mountain Of Attention Sanctuary in northern California and at Adi Da Samrajashram Hermitage in Fiji.

title: The Guru Is Sufficient
author: A Discourse Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: Avatar Adi Da makes the basic point that is the fundamental principle of His Reality-Teaching: The devotional relationship to the Guru is the essential means for all true Spiritual growth.

title: "I Am Always Already Free"
summary: For those who have received and felt the Blessing of Adi Da Samraj's life and work, this DVD is a must-have. "I Am Always Already Free" chronicles the last sixty days of Avatar Adi Da's life.

title: The Intelligence of the Heart
author: A Discourse Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: Avatar Adi Da clarifies: The Great Process of human transformation and Divine Realization has real requirements. And there are many pitfalls for aspiring practitioners. In this Discourse, Adi Da gives essential Instruction on how this process is effectively engaged so that free and consistent growth is assured.

title: The Lesson of Life
subtitle: A Conversation with Young Practitioners of the Reality-Way of Adidam
author: Discourses Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: Avatar Adi Da responds to a gathering of His young devotees who were on retreat at Adi Da Samrajashram (Avatar Adi Da's principal Hermitage, in Fiji) in 1991. Avatar Adi Da gives loving, challenging, and sometimes startling responses to their questions, always drawing His young devotees beyond adolescence and into their greatest understanding, intelligence, and heart-intuition.

title: The Process of Spiritual Transmission
author: Discourses Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: In these Talks from July 1988, given at the Mountain Of Attention Sanctuary in northern California, Avatar Adi Da Samraj describes the first six stages of life (based upon His own seven-stage schema), and the unique and Graceful process of real Spiritual Transmission.

title: The Quest for the Historical Self
author: A Discourse Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: In this Discourse, Adi Da Samraj proposes that all human lifetimes are a "quest for the historical self". He describes how this search is based on the erroneous presumption of an actual, defined, knowable "self". His Discourse exposes that neither experience nor memory nor the sensations of the physical body actually define a separate entity. The "I" is a fiction, a lie--and Reality Itself is Self-Evident only when the activity of the "self"-contraction is transcended.

tracks.trackName: The Separate Self You Claim to Be
The Demonstration of the Divine Conscious Light
Sacred Sightings of Avatar Adi Da Samraj
Learn More About the Divine Life and Teaching of Avatar Adi Da Samraj

title: Relinquish the Mummery of This World
author: A Discourse Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: This DVD is from the first occasion in many years in which Avatar Adi Da spoke directly to a gathering of His devotees in California. Questions from devotees about intimate, familial, and social issues are met with Avatar Adi Da's Compassion and Humor, as well as His Liberating Wisdom.
s3URL: Relinquish the Mummery of This World

tracks.trackName: What Does True Yogic Intimacy Look Like?
The Real Question Is the Questioner
The Two Birds in the Tree
I Am the Seed of The Mummery Book
You Cannot Fulfill All the Expectations of Others
Choose the Purpose of Your Life
You Do Not Have to Be a Mummer
The Steadiness of Turning to Me
Fall in the Heart of Communion with Me
No One Is Thinking These Words
Learn More About the Divine Life and Teaching of Avatar Adi Da Samraj

title: A Tribute to the Life and Work of His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj, Part One
subtitle: On the Occasion of the One-Year Anniversary of His Divine Mahasamadhi
author: by Devotees, Family, and Friends of Adi Da Samraj
summary: On the First Anniversary of His Divine Mahasamadhi (passing), devotees, family, and friends of Adi Da Samraj gathered at Adi Da Samrajashram, Fiji, His principal Hermitage, to acknowledge, and for seven joyful hours, to speak their praise of His Greatness and their heart-felt gratitude for the Blessings received from Him.

tracks.trackName: Adi Da's Divine Life and Work (Ruchiradama Nadikanta)
Video Testimonials (Surendra Singh and Vinod Karki)
Video Testimonial: Acquisition of Adi Da Samrajashram (Brian O'Mahony)
Slideshow: 1986-2000 (Voice: Adi Da Samraj, Music: Ray Lynch)
Slideshow: The Mummery Book (Music: Kit Walker)
Video: The Scapegoat Book (Recitation: Adi Da Samraj)
Slideshow: "I Am Who You Are" (Music: JoAnne Sunshine and Ray Lynch, Vocals: Crane Kirkbride)
Video: Formal Sighting of Adi Da Samraj

title: A Tribute to the Life and Work of His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj, Part Two
subtitle: On the Occasion of the One-Year Anniversary of His Divine Mahasamadhi
author: by Devotees, Family, and Friends of Adi Da Samraj
summary: On the First Anniversary of His Divine Mahasamadhi (passing), devotees, family, and friends of Adi Da Samraj gathered at Adi Da Samrajashram, Fiji, His principal Hermitage, to acknowledge, and for seven joyful hours, to speak their praise of His Greatness and their heart-felt gratitude for the Blessings received from Him.

tracks.trackName: Slideshow: 1939-1970 (Keyboards: Naamleela Free Jones Vocals: Io Shawnee, Tamarind, and Naamleela Free Jones)
Growing Up As Adi Da's Sister (Joanne Urban)
Adi Da's Work with Children: Introduction (Jonathan Condit)
Slideshow: Remember the Mystery (Additional Visuals: Maja Mumenthaler, Keyboards: Ray Lynch, Vocal: Jonah Straus)
Growing Up as a Devotee of Adi Da (Nara Wood, Rachel Kuhn, Megan Anderson)
The Massive Scale of Adi Da's Writing (Jonathan Condit)
Image-Art: Testimonials (Ben Grisso, Ruy Carpenter, Stanley Hastings)
Image-Art: Video Testimonials (Peter Frank, Peter Carlson, Michel Karman)
Slideshow: Fine Art Exhibitions (Music: John Mackay)
Slideshow: Adi Da Samraj: Artist of Transcendental Realism (Music:Vocals: Naamleela Free Jones)
Not-Two Is Peace: Video Testimonials (Jeffrey Kripal, Erwin Laszlo, Chief Phil Lane, Rolf Carriere, Bryan Deschamp)
Slideshow: "The Universal World-Prayer" (Music: Vocals: Jacqueline Clemons)
Video: Formal Sighting of Adi Da Samraj. Additional music: John Wubbenhorst (Facing East) and Felix Woldenberg

title: Locate What Is Real
author: A Discourse Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: This DVD presents Avatar Adi Da's Discourse of October 10, 2004. In Part 1, He describes how Reality is the true "first experience" for everyone--more fundamental to existence than identification with the apparently "born" being. In Part 2, He speaks about how music and other arts can function as extensions of Spirituality. In Part 3, He speaks about Ramana Maharshi and the sixth stage orientation, in contrast to His seventh stage Reality-Way. In Part 4, He addresses a devotee's experience of emotional trauma, and how such events can affect one's life. And in Part 5, He describes His own Submission, in His early life, to the process of Christian mystical experience.

tracks.trackName: The Way Is the Same as the Truth
Sensitivity to Realizers Who Have Passed
You Cannot Be Immune to Experience
Association with Me After the Physical Lifetime
Early-Life Submission to the Mind and Culture of Christianity
To find out more about Avatar Adi Da Samraj

title: Sex, Laughter, and Real-God-Realization
author: A Discourse Given by His Divine Presence, Adi Da Samraj
summary: Avatar Adi Da first addresses the illusory presumptions of the "Creator God" and the separate "self" (or "ego"). Neither the Divine nor the ego is the "generator" of anything, He Says--everything is simply arising in and as the Divine Condition.

title: Myths, Realizers, and Divine Revelation
subtitle: Discourses given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
author: Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: In this two-hour Discourse, Avatar Adi Da illustrates the process of myth-making around Realizers, both in ancient and modern times.

tracks.trackName: The Ancient Myth of the Son of Man
The ego Cannot Realize the Self-Condition
The Way Is Not about Belief

title: The Way That Begins With Realization
author: Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: These Discourse excerpts are an incredible resource for understanding Adi Da's seventh stage Way with the guidance of His "map" of the six stages of life, which correlates to the structures of the human being.
s3URL: The Way That Begins With Realization

tracks.trackName: The Fulfillment of the Great Tradition

title: The Wordless Condition Prior to "I"
author: A Discourse Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: In this extended Discourse occasion, Avatari Adi Da discusses the unique Transformative Process of Living Grace He Offers to all, the development of the capacity for discrimination, and the necessarily Self-Revealed Nature of the Divine.
s3URL: The Wordless Condition Prior to I

tracks.trackName: The Seventh Stage Way from the Beginning
You Are a Convention of Language
The Witness Is the Status of Consciousness
To find out more about Avatar Adi Da Samraj

title: The Bridge to God
subtitle: A Discourse Given
author: His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: On October 26, 1980, a shaman from Mexico visited the Mountain Of Attention, Avatar Adi Da Samrajs Northern California sanctuary. The following day, Avatar Adi Da considered with His devotees the inherently magical nature of the world and our psychic relationship to it.

tracks.trackName: The World Is a Psychic Phenomenon
Discover the Real Nature of Existence

title: You Can't Get There From Here
subtitle: Discourses Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
author: Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: The famous punch line "You can't get there from here" is Avatar Adi Da's starting point for this engaging discourse. He uses the humorous paradox to perfectly crystallize the condition of all who are caught in the trap of seeking.
s3URL: You Cant Get There From Here

tracks.trackName: The self Can't Get to God
The Body Arises in a Universal Field
The Spiritual Master Is Not a Religious Man

title: Guru As Prophet
author: His Divine Presence, Avatari Adi Da Samraj
summary: Avatar Adi Da clarifies the Function of the True Guru, which is not to satisfy or relieve the seeker, but to frustrate all forms of the search for self-fulfillment--whether through money, food, sex, or even Spiritual practice.

tracks.trackName: The Prophetic Function of the Guru
The Transforming Event of Real Intelligence

title: Money, Food, and Sex
author: His Divine Presence, Avatari Adi Da Samraj
summary: Avatar Adi Da clarifies the Function of the True Guru, which is not to satisfy or relieve the seeker, but to frustrate all forms of the search for self-fulfillment--whether through money, food, sex, or even Spiritual practice.

tracks.trackName: Truth Begins from the Ground Up
Spiritual Life is a Demand not a Form of Therapy

title: The Avon Lady
author: His Divine Presence, Avatari Adi Da Samraj
summary: A humorous and penetrating Discourse from the very earliest years of Avatar Adi Da's Teaching-Work offering basic Instruction regarding the nature of seeking and the Awakening Function of the True Guru.

tracks.trackName: The Heart Itself Must Enter In

title: Walking The Dog
author: His Divine Presence, Avatari Adi Da Samraj
summary: A humorous and penetrating Discourse from the very earliest years of Avatar Adi Da's Teaching-Work offering basic Instruction regarding the nature of seeking and the Awakening Function of the True Guru.

title: The Secret of Experience
subtitle: Two Discourses Given by His Divine Presence
author: His Divine Presence, Avatara Adi Da Samraj
summary: What kind of experiences might you notice arising in the course of esoteric practice or via Spiritual Transmission? What is the secret to relating to them rightly?

tracks.trackName: The Ego Is Not Exiled from Reality
The Process Is the Practice not the Experiences

title: What Is Your Intention?
subtitle: A Discourse Given by His Divine Presence
author: His Divine Presence, Avatari Adi Da Samraj
summary: Avatar Adi Da describes the three options of human destiny: you can reinforce your present existence in gross (physical) form, you can go beyond gross existence into subtler dimensions of existenceor you can transcend conditional existence altogether

title: Aletheon
subtitle: The Divine Avataric Self-Revelation of His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary:
"My Divine Avataric Self-Revelation-Word Became a completely different kind of Utterance. 
Most essentially, My Divine Avataric Self-Revelation-Word has Become The Aletheon."
--His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj 

This final and greatest Instruction by Avatar Adi Da spans over 2300 pages. The Aletheon eight-volume edition, recommended for ease of study, includes an attractive slipcover.

title: You Are The Question You Ask
subtitle: A Discourse Given by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: In addition to some of His most potent Instruction about the nature of devotional turning to Him (previously only available on CD), in this DVD Avatar Adi Da addresses a broad range of topics.
s3URL: You Are The Question You Ask

tracks.trackName: A Question Too Boring to Answer
The Only Rule Is Doing What Is Fruitful
The self-Contraction Is the Habit of Turning on self
Turn to the Source, Not to the Content
Be Loosened from the Method of egoity
What Can Be Done About the Dark Time
The Witness Position Is Prior to Attention
The Ultimate Completeness Is Divine Translation
The Practice Applies All the Time

title: The Teaching Manual of Perfect Summaries (Recitation)
subtitle: The Preliminary Root-Practice of The Reality-Way of Perfect Knowledge
author: by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: The three essential dimensions of life-practice in the Reality-Way of Adidam are "radical" devotion, right life, and "Perfect Knowledge". And Avatar Adi Das core Instruction in the preliminary practice of "Perfect Knowledge" is given in "The Teaching Manual of Perfect Summaries".
s3URL: The Teaching Manual of Perfect Summaries Recitation

tracks.trackName: The Teaching Manual of Perfect Summaries
The Teaching Manual of Perfect Summaries: Musical

title: The Teaching Manual of Perfect Summaries (Chanting)
subtitle: The Preliminary Root-Practice of The Reality-Way of Perfect Knowledge
author: by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: This double-CD set is principally designed to support the formal practice of listening to Avatar Adi Da's "Perfect Knowledge" Teachings. It includes both recitation and chanting of the Text--with versions that allow one to simply listen to either form, or to participate in the chanted form.
s3URL: The Teaching Manual of Perfect Summaries Chanting

tracks.trackName: The Teaching Manual of Perfect Summaries

title: Identification of the Beloved
author: by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: Avatar Adi Da draws us into noticing the true nature of this world, in which we find the Beloved--the True Loved One--only in passing forms. Adi Da admonishes everyone to find the True Beloved in Its Eternal Form if Happiness is to be truly found.

title: Guru, Faith, and Divine Communion
author: by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: "If you will simply enter into Communion with the Spiritual Master Who is already in the Condition of God-Realization, That Condition will be duplicated in your case. It is the Supreme Instrument." --Avatar Adi Da Samraj

tracks.trackName: Live from the Principle of Truth

title: I Will Do Everything
author: by His Divine Presence, Avatar Adi Da Samraj
summary: Avatar Adi Da beautifully illuminates the nature of the relationship to the Spiritual Master, or Guru. This sacred relationship is the means by which the Divine becomes operative in your life.
